data.actual_result: Invite Box outline starts to shrink.
data.expected_result: Invite box outline stays with the box as you keep trying to add friends.
data.short_description: Attempting to add a large amount of users to a group dm causes invite box outline to shrink.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be owner of a group DM. - Have a large amount of friends on Discord (Or a bunch with super long usernames) - Click button to add friends to DM. - Keep clicking on friends name to attempt add them to the DM.
